resources.string: is an independent state agency set up according to the Health Promotion Act 2001 and has Governing Board chaired by the Prime Minister with half of its members from independent social organizations.
We work with wide range of multi-sectoral partners which aim to promote well-being in 4 dimensions: Physical, Mental, Spiritual and Social.

Our mission is To promote initiative, enthusiasm, coordination and mobilization among individuals as well as various organizations in all sectors so that they have capability to form a society conducive to good health.
Thai Federation on Logistics has been operate the Happy Workplace scheme which supported by Thai Health Promotion Foundation under a project
name “New dimensional of happy workplace to increase wellbeing for land logistics staffs”.
As a result, we create an ASEAN language translation application for logistics industry which consist of 10 ASEAN Languages plus Chinese.
This application will be useful for logistics’ staffs and entrepreneurs who need to develop working skills and abilities.
In order to, be more efficiency and prepared for the opening of ASEAN Economic Community (AEC).
